app.title: Y Chip Area Visualizer
app.description: This app parses TXT or JSON output of <0 /> <1 />  command, and visualizes the component area in a treemap. Originally developed for <2 />, it can be generalized to any compatible Yosys outputs.
app.clickInstructions: Click the cells in the generated graph to display detailed information.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: All parsing is done locally in the browser, and no data is sent to any server. We use <0 /> for visualization, and <1 /> for DOM manipulation. The animations are powered by <2 /> in SVG, without using third-party animation libraries. Aside from its primary functionalities, this app can also serve as an example of writing modern visualizations that are both declarative and beautiful.
howItWorks.sourceCode: The source code for this app is available at <0 />.

dialog.updateDescription: A new version of this app is available. Refresh to update?
